attributes.action: Give ex service men and women houses befor immigrants and refugees
attributes.background:
There are many service men and women who are left in the street with nothing after serving for Queen and country and our government seem more intrested in helping people from other countries
who have done nothing for us and who wil never do anything other than drain the county

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107702

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
